title: Navaratan Polki Jhumka: A Timeless Blossom of Tradition
materials: Jade bead accents. Finely crafted with a lustrous Hyderabadi polish.
features: This exquisite pair of earrings features a floral design, expertly handcrafted with uncut Polki diamonds that capture and reflect light beautifully. A vibrant Ruby sits at the heart of each flower, surrounded by glistening Polki Diamonds. Each Jhumka is further enhanced with a delicate cascade of natural pearls and a soothing Jade bead drop, adding a touch of contemporary flair to the traditional design.
occasions: or any event where you want to showcase classic Indian elegance with a modern twist.
description: These Jhumkas are a testament to timeless craftsmanship and the enduring beauty of Polki diamonds. The blend of traditional and contemporary elements makes them a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the carefully selected gemstones symbolize prosperity and good fortune. A true heirloom piece!
